title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 604.6 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 604.6 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) Except where
fees are established by law, rule or regulation, no fee shall be charged for: (1)
inspection of a record; (2)
record searches; (3)
certification (see section
604.12
of this Part) pursuant to
this Part; and
(4)
amendment or
correction of a record found to be in error. (b) Fees for photocopies or data printouts of
records available pursuant to this Part shall be 25 cents per single-sided page
or $60 for transfer of a computer file to a requester's computer
tape. (c) Fees shall be paid in
full prior to issuance of copies, transcripts or their certification. (d) Payment shall be made in the form of a
check, bank draft, or money order payable to the New York State Office for

People With Developmental Disabilities; or, if personally delivered may be made
in cash for which a receipt shall be given. (e) A fee may be waived or reduced at the
discretion of the records access officer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
604.6

Amended

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
